author: jerenkrantz
msg: Initial version of the httpd-test subproject page.
perl-framework people can do their own pages.  =)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: As the worker MPM is really an alternative to the threaded MPM                  (and hopefully it'll be a replacement), the httpd.conf settings                 are identical.

author: orlikowski
msg: Fix a case where on restart, an admin started logging, and the logging
code waited to start until the second pass (assuming we were just starting
up) to open the log file. Also fix a typo.

author: trawick
msg: Fix a growing connection pool in core_output_filter() for
keepalive requests.  We were allocating a brigade out of the
connection pool; the number of these brigades allocated

author: rederpj
msg: Moved split_and_pass_pretag_buckets back to being a
macro at Ryans's request. Removed the return from it
by setting and returning a return code instead. Updated
the code to check the return code from teh macro and
